import CustomButton from '../custom-button/custom-button.component' import CartItem from '../cart-item/cart-item.component' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { selectCartItems } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import { } from '../../redux/cart' import './cart-dropdown.styles.scss' const CartDropdown = ({ cartItems, history }) => (
{ cartItems.length > 0 ? cartItems.map((cartItem) => ) : Your cart is empty }
history.push('/checkout')}>GO TO CHECKOUT
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems }) export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps)(CartDropdown))
